ygData.subject: Re: How to stop spam/hate/annoying emails that are private forever!
ygData.msgSnippet: Nick, goto http://thomas.loc.gov/ and under the word/or phrase search.. look up +ACI-Electronic mail+ACI- It will bring up all the laws concerning electronic
ygData.messageBody:
Nick, goto http://thomas.loc.gov/ and under the word/or phrase search.. look up +ACI-Electronic mail+ACI- It will bring up all the laws concerning electronic mail and such.. you will see that your claim is not feasible.
NOW END THIS THREAD+ACE-

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve
it through not dying.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time FAVORITE OXYMORON....: 'Microsoft works'+ACEAIQAhACEAIQAh-
-----Original Message-----
From: Nick brutalny+AEA-concentric.net
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, August 04, 1999 11:57 PM
Subject: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- How to stop spam/hate/annoying emails that are private forever+ACE-


From: +ACI-Nick+ACI- brutalny+AEA-concentric.net

+AD4APAA8ADw-Message: 6
Date: Wed, 04 Aug 1999 14:23:09 EDT
From: +ACI-Chet Watkins+ACI- chetwatkins+AEA-hotmail.com
Subject: RE: Sean.Clark+AEA-UCHSC.edu

Let me get an understanding of this. Can anyone charge a proofreading fee?
What exactly is it? I guess I've been out of the scaming business too long
+AD4AOw-).+AD4APgA


Here is how my lawyer put it to me. If someone sends you unsolicited email
once it is fine, but if you warn them after that email saying the following
or close to it +ACI-any further emails to this address will cost a certain
amount of money to proofread+ACI- it is legally binding. If the person does not
make a payment within 3 months you can take them to small claims court and
charge interest on your time and work. When you warn them, and they send
you another email just correct it and send it back to them. Afterwards
start litigation. This is an excellent way to stop hate/spam/annoying
emails.
